Welcome to the
Spatial Sonic Fingerprints

Explore differences and similarities between browser fingerprints through sound. A device is represented by a tetrahedron floating in space.

By moving closer you can zoom in on the sound of that particular device. You can listen to a group of devices by putting yourself at an equal distance from all of them.

You will start close to the fingerprints of devices that are currently connected to the exhibition, but you are encouraged to move out of this bubble and explore the sounds of devices that have connected to the server in the past.

Use the filter slider to see how unique your fingerprint is among the ones surrounding you.

This is a sonic experience! Use headphones for the optimal experience.
